articles.description: Haas Formula 1 team boss Gunther Steiner insists that Kevin Magnussen was the only driver he spoke to as a potential replacement for Nikita Mazepin.
articles.content: Although the team also had reserve driver Pietro Fittipaldi on standby, Steiner and team owner Gene Haas had decided early on that they wanted to target Magnussen, who drove for the team for four sea… [+2737 chars]

articles.author: Joe Donnohue
articles.title: Every word Jesse Marsch said on Leeds United 'stress', Elland Road dissent and Firpo diagnosis - Leeds Live
articles.description: Leeds United head coach Jesse Marsch spoke to the media following the Whites' 3-0 defeat to Aston Villa at Elland Road
articles.content:
Leeds United were beaten at Elland Road for the fourth consecutive game as the Whites surrendered to Steven Gerrard's Aston Villa.
Jesse Marsch has only been in charge for two matches, but his side … [+12626 chars]

articles.title: Hull FC player ratings as Jake Connor dazzles in stunning victory - Hull Live
articles.description: The Black and Whites put Leeds Rhinos to the sword.
articles.content:
Hull FC picked up their third win in five matches as they hammered Leeds Rhinos 31-8.
Here are the player ratings.
